info.author: Stephan Jorek
info.description:
Pygments Segment Token
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The Pygments Segment Token package provides generic tokens and utilities
for the Pygments syntax-highlighting package written in Python.

It provides generic `Segment.…`-tokens to be injected into the token-stream
by other means not implemented here and utility function related to tokens
in options.

Install the `Pygments Segment Token tip`_ via ``easy_install Pygments-Segment-Token==dev``.

.. _Pygments Segment Token tip:
   http://bitbucket.org/sjorek/pygments-segment-token/get/tip.zip#egg=Pygments-Segment-Token-dev

:copyright: Copyright 2013 Stephan Jorek
:license: BSD, see LICENSE for details.
